16 #define _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name,val,type) LPVar* name; \
17 static void __attribute__((constructor)) initialize_##name() { \
18 @autoreleasepool { \
19 name = [LPVar define:[@#name stringByReplacingOccurrencesOfString:@"_" withString:@"."] with##type:val]; \
20 } \
21 }
22 
32 #define DEFINE_VAR_INT(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, Int)
33 #define DEFINE_VAR_BOOL(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, Bool)
34 #define DEFINE_VAR_STRING(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, String)
35 #define DEFINE_VAR_NUMBER(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, Number)
36 #define DEFINE_VAR_FLOAT(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, Float)
37 #define DEFINE_VAR_CGFLOAT(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, CGFloat)
38 #define DEFINE_VAR_DOUBLE(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, Double)
39 #define DEFINE_VAR_SHORT(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, Short)
40 #define DEFINE_VAR_LONG(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, Long)
41 #define DEFINE_VAR_CHAR(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, Char)
42 #define DEFINE_VAR_LONG_LONG(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, LongLong)
43 #define DEFINE_VAR_INTEGER(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, Integer)
44 #define DEFINE_VAR_UINT(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedInt)
45 #define DEFINE_VAR_UCHAR(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedChar)
46 #define DEFINE_VAR_ULONG(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedLong)
47 #define DEFINE_VAR_UINTEGER(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedInteger)
48 #define DEFINE_VAR_USHORT(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedShort)
49 #define DEFINE_VAR_ULONGLONG(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedLongLong)
50 #define DEFINE_VAR_UNSIGNED_INT(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedInt)
51 #define DEFINE_VAR_UNSIGNED_INTEGER(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedInteger)
52 #define DEFINE_VAR_UNSIGNED_CHAR(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedChar)
53 #define DEFINE_VAR_UNSIGNED_LONG(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedLong)
54 #define DEFINE_VAR_UNSIGNED_LONG_LONG(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedLongLong)
55 #define DEFINE_VAR_UNSIGNED_SHORT(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, UnsignedShort)
56 #define DEFINE_VAR_FILE(name,filename) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, filename, File)
57 #define DEFINE_VAR_DICTIONARY(name,dict) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, dict, Dictionary)
58 #define DEFINE_VAR_ARRAY(name,array) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, array, Array)
59 #define DEFINE_VAR_COLOR(name,val) _LP_DEFINE_HELPER(name, val, Color)

61 #define DEFINE_VAR_DICTIONARY_WITH_OBJECTS_AND_KEYS(name,...) LPVar* name; \
62 static void __attribute__((constructor)) initialize_##name() { \
63 @autoreleasepool { \
64 name = [LPVar define:[@#name stringByReplacingOccurrencesOfString:@"_" withString:@"."] withDictionary:[NSDictionary dictionaryWithObjectsAndKeys:__VA_ARGS__]]; \
65 } \
66 }
67 
68 #define DEFINE_VAR_ARRAY_WITH_OBJECTS(name,...) LPVar* name; \
69 static void __attribute__((constructor)) initialize_##name() { \
70 @autoreleasepool { \
71 name = [LPVar define:[@#name stringByReplacingOccurrencesOfString:@"_" withString:@"."] withArray:[NSArray arrayWithObjects:__VA_ARGS__]]; \
72 } \
73 }

82 #define LEANPLUM_USE_ADVERTISING_ID \
83  _Pragma("clang diagnostic push") \
84  _Pragma("clang diagnostic ignored \"-Warc-performSelector-leaks\"") \
85  id LeanplumIdentifierManager = [NSClassFromString(@"ASIdentifierManager") \
86  performSelector:NSSelectorFromString(@"sharedManager")]; \
87  if (floor(NSFoundationVersionNumber) <= 1299 /* NSFoundationVersionNumber_iOS_9_x_Max */ || \
88  [LeanplumIdentifierManager performSelector: \
89  NSSelectorFromString(@"isAdvertisingTrackingEnabled")]) { \
90  /* < iOS10 || isAdvertisingTrackingEnabled */ \
91  [Leanplum setDeviceId:[[LeanplumIdentifierManager performSelector: \
92  NSSelectorFromString(@"advertisingIdentifier")] \
93  performSelector:NSSelectorFromString(@"UUIDString")]]; \
94  } \
95  _Pragma("clang diagnostic pop")
